articles.title: Staying hydrated may help reduce long-term risks for heart failure: Study - Times of India
articles.description: Researchers have found that drinking enough water and staying hydrated may reduce the risk of severe heart problems in the future.The findings of the research were published in the 'European Heart Journal'.Heart failure, a chronic condition that develops when…

articles.title: Slovak minister says paying in roubles an option, country needs gas - Reuters.com
articles.description: The economy minister of Slovakia, which relies on Russian gas for around 85% of its demand, said the country could not be cut off from Russian gas flows and if it had to pay in roubles it would, although it backed taking a common European Union stance.
